publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4100 Willie Coffey: Congratulations to Brush Barclay—That the Parliament congratulates the management and workers at railway rolling stock company Brush Barclay on the successful completion of the first stage of a £3.5 million contract, which saw five of a planned 16 refurbished rail units handed over to operators First Great Western; recognises that this was the first major contract that the company secured after its predecessor, Hunslet-Barclay, was placed in administration; applauds the efforts made by the management and workforce to rescue the company, and wishes them well in carrying forward an enterprise that has had a presence in Kilmarnock since Andrew Barclay and Sons entered the railway engineering business 150 years ago.

S3M-4100 Congratulations to Brush Barclay (lodged on 8 May 2009) Rob Gibson*, Christopher Harvie*, Bob Doris*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Cathy Jamieson*, Stuart McMillan*, John Wilson*, Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*
S3M-4100 Congratulations to Brush Barclay (lodged on 8 May 2009) Christina McKelvie*, Hugh Henry*
